title: Hodoor
author: Hodoor
content: HeyI was thinking about posting this in the japanese sub forum but it's pretty much dead in there so i thought i would have better chances here.So as the title says, I'm looking for someone who can speak Japanese. You don't necessarily have to be fluent as it's not a translation job, but you will need to know enough to keep up and start conversations.If you are interested just shoot me a pm.

comments.author: STT
comments.body: I know a Japanese and English speaker who already does work professionally for a Japanese firm in customer service.  IF you give me the details or the website it involves, I can pass on that information and ask them if they are interested in further work.   Japanese is not their 1st language but they are fluent and converse every day as part of their job.  Let me know if thats ok, also its a women not guy if thats relevant at all.
